In England, in the seven days to 08 December, there were 288,604 new confirmed cases (510.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 December, there were 268,977 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 7% (19,627 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 13 December is 9,222,932 (16,309.3 cases per 100,000 population).
